mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO licenseVehicleTravel (userId,plateNo,carType,useType,modelType,vin, issueDate,regDate,engineNo,frontImgUrl,remark,createTime,ownerName) VALUES (#{userId},#{plateNo},#{carType},#{useType},#{modelType},#{vin},#{issueDate},#{regDate}, #{engineNo},#{key},#{remark},now(),#{ownerName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE frontImgUrl=#{key},remark=#{remark},ownerName=#{ownerName} updateTime=now()
mapper.update: update licenseVehicleTravel set plateNo=#{plateNo},carType=#{carType},useType=#{useType},modelType=#{modelType}, vin=#{vin}, issueDate=#{issueDate},regDate=#{regDate},engineNo=#{engineNo}, frontImgUrl=#{key}, updateTime=now() where userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO licenseVehicleTravel (userId,backImgUrl,createTime) VALUES (#{userId},#{key},now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE backImgUrl=#{key}, updateTime=now()
